data.meta_description: Prints of XIR352327 The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies. Our beautiful Wall Art
data.text:
Fine Art Finder Photo Prints and Wall Art

The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand

XIR352327 The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand de France, Duke of Berry on June 17, 1816 (oil on canvas) by Lemasle, Louis Nicolas (1788-1876); Museo e Gallerie Nazionali di Capodimonte, Naples, Italy; (add.info.: La Duchesse de Berry (1798-1870), daughter of Francis, roi des Deux Siciles et Maria Clementina of Austria; wife of Charles Ferdinand, Duc de Berry (1778-1820); mother of Comte de Chambord (1820-83); ); French, out of copyright. Â© www.bridgemanimages.com

Media ID 12863896

Framed Prints

Add timeless elegance to your home decor with Media Storehouse's Framed Prints featuring "The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand" by Lemasle, as seen on Fine Art Finder. This exquisite oil on canvas painting, captured by Bridgeman Images, showcases the grand wedding ceremony of Marie-Caroline and Charles-Ferdinand in 1816. Bring the beauty of this historic moment into your living space and create a captivating conversation piece with our premium framed prints. Each print is meticulously crafted with attention to detail and presented in a sleek, modern frame, ensuring a stunning visual experience. Elevate your interior design and add a touch of royal history to your home with Media Storehouse's Framed Prints.

Photo Prints

Experience the grandeur of 19th-century European royalty with our exquisite selection of photographic prints from Media Storehouse. This stunning image, "The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand de France, Duke of Berry" (XIR352327), showcases the elaborate and opulent wedding scene of the royal couple painted by Lemasle in 1816. Captured in the finest detail from the original oil on canvas artwork held by Bridgeman Images, our photographic print brings the beauty and history of this iconic moment to your home or office. Order now and add a touch of timeless elegance to your space.

Poster Prints

Bring timeless elegance to your walls with Media Storehouse's Poster Prints featuring "The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand" by Lemasle. This exquisite fine art print, sourced from Bridgeman Images through Fine Art Finder, captures the grandeur of the royal wedding between Marie-Caroline and Charles-Ferdinand, Duke of Berry in 1816. With intricate detail and vibrant colors, this oil on canvas painting transports you to a bygone era. Adorn your home or office with this beautiful work of art and add a touch of history and sophistication to your space.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Experience the elegant artistry of the past with Media Storehouse's exquisite jigsaw puzzles. Our latest addition to the collection showcases the stunning painting "The Marriage of Marie-Caroline de Bourbon, Princess of the Two Sicilies and Charles-Ferdinand" by Lemasle. This fine art masterpiece, originally painted in oil on canvas in 1816, captures the grandeur and opulence of a bygone era. With intricate details and vibrant colors, this jigsaw puzzle is not only a fun and engaging activity but also a beautiful work of art to display once completed. Immerse yourself in history and create a piece of timeless beauty with Media Storehouse's jigsaw puzzles.
